name: Cry of The Mermaid
description:
An abandoned passenger vessel, known as The Mermaid, awaits you on your investigation to uncover it's dark secrets of what occurred here, but sometimes, the unknown is best left to be....   

Average Play Time:

30-45 Minutes

Controls:

F to switch Lamp light modes

WASD to move

Left mouse/E to interact

Shift to Sprint

Credits:

Producer: Keenan Simpson

Gameplay and Mechanics: Jamie Neal

Level Designers:  Kai Rees, Simon Lowes

3D Artists: Aimar Larrion, Isaac Webster, Wang Yiteng

Animators: Kai Wade, Chi Chuwei
